name: All Reprisals and Arrears, Mine to Bear
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Arlecchino, play this card on them. Attach 3 stacks of Bond of Life to Arlecchino.
When your Arlecchino, who has this equipped, takes DMG, if possible, consume 1 stack of Bond of Life to negate 1 DMG.
(You must have Arlecchino in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
